column4: When I did a dist-upgrade to 8.04, I was asked about the grub bootloader and the menu.lst file, because it wanted to update it so I could boot the newest kernel. Naive as I am, I said yes. Now I've lost the Windows XP portion of my menu.lst file. I've tried to replace it, with no luck. I get something about needing an absolute filename. Windows is at /dev/sda1. http://pastebin.com/d6a555955
and remove the space between + and 1 in line 167
